text: Dobsonville Mall is a shopping centre in Johannesburg, South Africa. Located in Dobsonville, it was the first shopping centre to be built in Soweto and was seen as an early symbol of economic development in the area."Soweto loses Cinderella image as billions are pegged for new projects; Malls, top shops and office space are part of upgrade plans.", The Star, July 17, 2006 ."Soweto Mall Nearly Complete", The Star, August 1994, reprinted in ==References== Category:Shopping centres in Johannesburg Category:Buildings and structures in Soweto Category:Shopping malls established in 1994
title: Dobsonville Shopping Centre
